Title: Ironweld Arsenal Cannon
Intro: An Ironweld Arsenal Cannon is armed with Cannon Shells.

Rules.Name: Crew
Rules.Rule: CREW: An Ironweld Arsenal Cannon has 3 Duardin Crew, who are armed with Artillery Tools. The crew must remain within 1" of the Ironweld Arsenal Cannon. For rules purposes, the Ironweld Arsenal Cannon and its crew are treated as a single model.

Rules.Name: Explosive Shells
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to hit rolls for a Cannon Shell if the target unit has more than 5 models.
